Analysis Steps: Parsed user requirements from the property request form.
Queried the Bayut API for matching listings based on property type, budget, and location.
Filtered results based on special requirements (bedrooms, sea view).
Aggregated market data from public sources and internal data.
Generated market insights and risk assessment based on the filtered results.

Generated Insights.Historical price trends: Apartment prices in Downtown Dubai have increased by 8% in the last year.
Generated Insights.Location-based insights: Sea view apartments in Downtown Dubai have a premium price compared to non-sea view properties.
Generated Insights.Supply/demand metrics: High demand for 2-bedroom apartments in this area; supply is moderate.
Generated Insights.Risk assessment: Low risk; the Downtown Dubai market is considered stable.

Recommendations.Alternative options: Consider similar apartments in the Marina area if the budget is a constraint.
